alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 9:06PM CDT until April 21 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Rockport. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Widespread flooding of low pastureland and bottomland is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 25.5 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Rockport 25.0 24.5 Sun 8 pm CDT 25.4 25.2 24.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 10 AM CDT.
